title: Verde-Timor-Leste
description: Top level site for Verde timor leste.  This site describes our diverse services in Timor Lest

home.title: Welcome to Verde Recycling and Marketing Services
home.description:
Verde is a established company in Timor Leste.   We are project based organization with over 10 years experience working in Timor Leste. We provide recycling solutions, project management and marketing services  to a variety of customers.  

Our three current projects are described below in more detail in the listing and they have separate websites for details


[Marketing Services](marketing.verde-tl.com)

[Recycle Business](recycle.verde-tl.com)

[Marketing App](app.verde-tl.com)
